comments.body: This should document self.become and others, to be consistent, I think ?
the whole list is pretty out of date, almost tempted to leave as is until v2 takes over

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +99,103 @@        inventory:        can be specified instead of host_list to use a pre-existing inventory object
        check:            don't change anything, just try to detect some potential changes
        any_errors_fatal: terminate the entire execution immediately when one of the hosts has failed
        force_handlers:   continue to notify and run handlers even if a task fails
        """
